original_title: De Apparatspott - Ick heep keene Lust mehr hier ünnen
overview: After the collision of two asteroids, the Apparatspott from Lower German city of Sulingen meets the damaged second-generation Enterprise of Captain Picard. From this the Apparatspott receives the order to get needed spare parts and to set up warning rockfall traffic signs around the collision area. But during the mission, the Apparatspott accidentally destroys an alien beer freighter, resulting in a galactic beer shortage.
title: De Apparatspott - Ick heep keene Lust mehr hier ünnen
